sample_questions: What should I check if my engine won't start?
How do I test the alternator?
What's the procedure for checking brake fluid?

sample_documents.text: To diagnose a no-start condition, first check the battery voltage. It should read 12.6V or higher when the engine is off.
The alternator can be tested with a multimeter. With the engine running, voltage should be between 13.5V and 14.5V.

expected_responses.no_start: Check battery, starter, fuel pump, ignition system
expected_responses.alternator_test: Use multimeter to measure voltage while engine running
